00018  * description: Class to store information about a nic for the
00019  *              ConnectionManager module

00021 
00022 #ifndef NICENTRY_H
00023 #define NICENTRY_H
00024 
00025 #include <omnetpp.h>
00026 #include <map>
00027 
00028 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00029 #include "Coord.h"
00030 
00031 class ChannelAccess;
00032 
00033 
00042 class MIXIM_API NicEntry : public cObject
00043 {
00044 protected:
00045   class NicEntryComparator {
00046     public:
00047     bool operator() (const NicEntry* nic1, const NicEntry* nic2) const {
00048       return nic1->nicId < nic2->nicId;
00049     }
00050   };
00051   public:
00053     typedef std::map<const NicEntry*, cGate*, NicEntryComparator> GateList;
00054 
00056     int nicId;
00057 
00059     cModule *nicPtr;
00060 
00062     int hostId;
00063 
00065     Coord pos;
00066 
00068     ChannelAccess* chAccess;
00069 
00070   protected:
00072     bool coreDebug;
00073 
00081     GateList outConns;
00082 
00083   public:
00087     NicEntry(bool debug)
00088       : cObject()
00089       , nicId(0)
00090       , nicPtr(NULL)
00091       , hostId(0)
00092       , pos()
00093       , chAccess(NULL)
00094       , coreDebug(debug)
00095       , outConns()
00096     { }
00097 
00098     NicEntry(const NicEntry& o)
00099       : cObject(o)
00100       , nicId(o.nicId)
00101       , nicPtr(o.nicPtr)
00102       , hostId(o.hostId)
00103       , pos(o.pos)
00104       , chAccess(o.chAccess)
00105       , coreDebug(o.coreDebug)
00106       , outConns(o.outConns)
00107     { }
00108 
00109     void swap(NicEntry& s)
00110   {
00111       std::swap(nicId, s.nicId);
00112       std::swap(nicPtr, s.nicPtr);
00113       std::swap(hostId, s.hostId);
00114       std::swap(pos, s.pos);
00115       std::swap(chAccess, s.chAccess);
00116       std::swap(coreDebug, s.coreDebug);
00117       std::swap(outConns, s.outConns);
00118   }
00119 
00120     NicEntry& operator=(const NicEntry& o)
00121     {
00122       nicId     = o.nicId;
00123       nicPtr    = o.nicPtr;
00124       hostId    = o.hostId;
00125       pos       = o.pos;
00126       chAccess  = o.chAccess;
00127       coreDebug = o.coreDebug;
00128       outConns  = o.outConns;
00129       return *this;
00130     }
00134     virtual ~NicEntry() {}
00135 
00137     virtual void connectTo(NicEntry*) = 0;
00138 
00140     virtual void disconnectFrom(NicEntry*) = 0;
00141 
00143     const GateList& getGateList() const {
00144       return outConns;
00145     }
00146 
00148     bool isConnected(const NicEntry* other) {
00149         return (outConns.find(other) != outConns.end());
00150     };
00151 
00160     const cGate* getOutGateTo(const NicEntry* to) const
00161     {
00162       return outConns.at(to);
00163     };
00164 
00165 };
00166 
00167 #endif
